posts.title: Whittier, Alaska: The Town Under One Roof – A Deep Dive into Life in America's Most Unique Community
posts.excerpt: Imagine a community where your entire world—your home, school, grocery store, and even the police station—exists within the confines of a single building.
posts.content: Imagine a community where your entire world—your home, school, grocery store, and even the police station—exists within the confines of a single building. Welcome to Whittier, Alaska. [Content truncated for brevity]

posts.title: Into the Glass Storm – Planet HD 189733 b
posts.excerpt: Far away in the constellation of Vulpecula, this blue world looks calm and peaceful—but it’s actually a raging inferno where glass rains sideways in supersonic winds.
posts.content: Far away in the constellation called Vulpecula, about 64.5 light-years from Earth, there is a strange and beautiful planet. It’s called HD 189733 b, and when as... [Content truncated for brevity]
